tool_description: Performs detailed thermal analysis of rocket engine components including temperature distributions, heat transfer rates, and thermal stress predictions for design validation.

component_type.description: Component to analyze: chamber, nozzle, injector, turbopump, valve

geometry_file.description: Path to component geometry definition file

material_properties.description: Material thermal properties: [conductivity, specific_heat, density, melting_point]

boundary_conditions.description: Thermal boundary conditions: [hot_side_temp, cold_side_temp, convection_coeff, heat_flux]

analysis_duration.description: Transient analysis duration in seconds (0.1 to 1000.0)

time_step.description: Analysis time step in seconds (0.001 to 10.0)

error_messages: Invalid component type: Must be one of [chamber, nozzle, injector, turbopump, valve]
Geometry file not found: Specified geometry file does not exist or is inaccessible
Invalid material properties: Array must contain exactly 4 positive values [conductivity, specific_heat, density, melting_point]
Invalid boundary conditions: Array must contain exactly 4 values [hot_side_temp, cold_side_temp, convection_coeff, heat_flux]
Analysis duration out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 1000.0 seconds
Time step out of range: Value must be between 0.001 and 10.0 seconds
Time step too large: Time step must be smaller than analysis_duration/100
usage: Specify component_type, provide geometry_file path, and define material_properties and boundary_conditions arrays with thermal properties. Optionally set analysis_duration and time_step for transient analysis. Tool outputs detailed thermal predictions.

heat_transfer_rate.description: Total heat transfer rate in watts

safety_margin.description: Safety margin below material limits (0.0 to 1.0)
